content: Petar Šlat is technology promiscuous person with interest in everything tied to code. Loves to attend monthly local meetup groups. In his spare time he plays around in his home lab where he is testing out new tools and technologies.

title: Petar Šlat

content:
Hello world again! So I forgot to extend my personal domain and decided to move to github for my personal blog.
My current todo list:
 Move old posts (still not sure how) Find better hugo theme  Update:
I won’t be moving anything, things can always be found on the wayback machine;
summary: Create a beautifully simple website in under 10 minutes.
title: The move

content:
With wealth, power and prestige come responsibilities.
The more you know more you have to share; That is the only way to more forward.
That’s my main drive; constantly learn and improve yourself and people around you.
